mean_cn: n. （图像的）说明文字；（报刊的）标题
mean_en: words that are printed underneath a picture, cartoon, etc. that explain or describe it
sentence: The caption below the photo tells you what's going on in the photo.
sentence_trans: 照片下方的说明告诉你照片里发生了什么。
word_etyma: capt拿，抓，握住 + ion表示行为、过程或结果 → caption(报刊的)标题；(插图、照片等的)说明文字
